1267360.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Essential Fantasy Music Pack
1267360.description:
The title says it all.... Essential Fantasy Music for all your fantasy game needs! Brand new from Tyler Cline, this pack is a well-rounded collection of music meant to fill every need of your game, from intense battles to emotional moments!

Features:

* 12 tracks for battles, towns, various biomes and conversations
* Wav, M4a and seamless-looping Ogg formats
* Royalty-free music for use with RPG Maker VX Ace or the engine of your choice

Tracklist:

01 - Battle 1
02 - Battle 2
03 - Boss Battle
04 - Cave Theme
05 - Celtic Village
06 - Town Theme
07 - Forest Level
08 - Fun Conversation
09 - Emotional Conversation
10 - Overworld Theme
11 - Volcano Level
12 - Winter Level
1267360.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 意大利语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 日语
